hanzi-su-wiki:
類

Значения

Сорт, вид, род, класс, разряд; сходство, подобие; классификация

Мнемоника

У европейцев главным 頁 среди животных считается лев, у китайцев — собака 犬. В растительном мире — дуб и рис 米, соответственно.

Варианты

類, 类
purpleculture_pinyin:
lèi
kind; type; class; category; similar; like; to resemble
своего рода; тип; учебный класс; категория; похожий; подобно; походить
rtega_mnemonic:
類類RS
类类		頪sort, class, group, kind, category
  • different kinds of living things: plants 米, animals 犬 and men 頁
  • ⓢ different kinds of living things: men 大 and plants 米

heisig_chinese_memo: In a Chinese restaurant the waiter says "What kind of rice would you like with your dog head?".
heisig_constituent: sort, rice, large, St. Bernard, head, page, one, ceiling, drop, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
koohiiStory1: Note this character means sort in the sense of what kind, I believe a better keyword would be "variety" and this character does appear in some dictionaries with the primary meaning as variety, my story: I´m in a Chinese restaurant and the waiter says "What sort of rice would you like with your dog head?".
koohiiStory2: Condi Rice is the SORT of person that would give HEADaches to a BIG DOG.....This story has been edited because of people reporting it. I like it better without "aches", but whatever works for you!
jp_example_words:
衣類(いるい): clothes, clothing, garments
類(たぐい): a kind
類似(るいじ): analogous
類推(るいすい): analogy
種類(しゅるい): variety, kind, type, category, counter for different sorts of things
書類(しょるい): documents, official papers
親類(しんるい): relation, kin
人類(じんるい): mankind, humanity
分類(ぶんるい): classification
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A big geoduck loves to eat rice of every type, kind, and category. It doesn’t matter what kind of rice it is, this big geoduck will eat it.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture this big geoduck shoveling rice down in a flurry of geoduckness. Hear the sloshing and goopy glugging as the geoduck gorges itself on every type of rice.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: While eating every type and kind of rice from every category, the big geoduck has become even bigger. Its body is ruined (るい). It’s painfully obese. This geoduck has eaten itself into ruin.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture this big, fat geoduck, too big to move. It’s now in a wheel chair and on a rice IV. Imagine its wheelchair squeaking by as it wheezes and groans.
Ru_Radicals: ハ, 大 (большой), 目 (глаз), 米 (рис), 貝 (раковина), 頁 (страница)
Ru_trainchinese:

lèi: (графема) напоминать, быть похожими
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the page (頁) is the big (大) rice (米) kind
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: What kind of rice would you like with your dog the waiter asks in Korea.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " dog " and "頪", the original meaning is kind, that is, the synthesis of multiple same or similar things. "Shuowen": "The type is similar, but the dog is the most important. From the dog, the piansheng." "Yi‧ Gan": "The one who is in the sky will kiss the person, and the one who is the earth will kiss, then each will follow its kind."

" Class " can refer to rules and procedures. "Xunzi‧Fei Twelve Sons": "The five elements are said to be old-fashioned." Wang Xianqian gathered and quoted Wang Niansun and said: "The kind is the law. The words are evil and impossible."

" Class " also refers to affair. "Mencius·Gaozishang": "It means that if you don't be human, you know evil; if your heart is not human, you don't know evil. This means that you don't know kind." Zhao Qi's note: "kind, things are also."

" Class " also refers to comparison. "The Book of Rites‧The Book of Learning": "Nine years, knowing the class is masterful, standing strong without reversing, it is said to be great." Zheng Xuan's note: "Knowing the class, the ratio of the knowledge and the justice."

" Class " also refers to similarity and resemblance. "Yi‧Xi Cixia": "So I started to make gossip, with the virtue of understanding the gods, with the affection of all things." Kong Yingdashu: "Today for gossip, with the love of all things, you can see it."

" Class " also means class. Tang Hanyu's "Tang Gu Xiangquan Tombstone": "Fan wrote the Ming Ci for nine years. The collection is composed of 50 volumes, and the world calls it its energy."

" Class " also means kindness and beauty. "Shu‧Taijiazhong": "I don't know the virtues of the boy, and he is not kind from the bottom." Kong Chuan: "Like, good."

Compliance can also be represented by " class ". "Mandarin ‧ Chu Yushang": "Heart-like German accents, and the country is built by virtue."

" Class " also means many. "Huainanzi: Essentials": "It is the beginning of the collection of objects and the introduction of classes, and the immersing of the elements, and soaking in the night class." Gao You's note: "Classes, the public."

" Class " can also mean everything, roughly. "Historical Records: The Biographies of Bo Yi": "The caveman, Qushe is sometimes like this, the class name is extinct and not known, sad husband!"
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " dog " and "頪", the original meaning is kind, that is, the synthesis of multiple identical or similar things.
humanum_full_description:
從「犬」，「頪」聲，本義為種類，即多種相同或相似事物的綜合。《說文》：「種類相似，唯犬爲甚。从犬，頪聲。」《易‧乾》：「本乎天者親上，本乎地者親下，則各從其類也。」

　　「類」可指法則、法式。《荀子‧非十二子》：「案往舊造說，謂之五行，甚僻違而無類。」王先謙集解引王念孫曰：「類者，法也。言邪僻而無法也。」

　　「類」也指事理。《孟子‧告子上》：「指不若人，則知惡之；心不若人，則不知惡，此之謂不知類也。」趙岐注：「類，事也。」

　　「類」亦指比較。《禮記‧學記》：「九年，知類通達，強立而不反，謂之大成。」 鄭玄注：「知類，知事義之比也。」

　　「類」還指相似、像。《易‧繫辭下》：「於是始作八卦，以通神明之德，以類萬物之情。」孔穎達疏：「今作八卦，以類象萬物之情，皆可見也。」

　　「類」也表示類次。唐韓愈〈唐故相權公墓碑〉：「凡撰命詞九年，以類集為五十卷，天下稱其能。」

　　「類」亦表示善、美好。《書‧太甲中》：「予小子不明于德，自底不類。」孔傳：「類，善也。」

　　遵循也可用「類」表示。《國語‧楚語上》：「心類德音，以德有國。」

　　「類」還表示眾多。《淮南子‧要略》：「乃始攬物引類，覽取撟掇，浸想宵類。」高誘注：「類，眾也。」

　　「類」還能表示皆、大抵。《史記‧伯夷列傳》：「巖穴之士，趣舍有時若此，類名堙滅而不稱，悲夫！」
humanum_short_description: 從「犬」，「頪」聲，本義為種類，即多種相同或相似事物的綜合。

從「 犬 」，「 頪 」聲，本義為種類，即多種相同或相似事物的綜合。《說文》：「種類相似，唯犬爲甚。从犬，頪聲。」《易‧乾》：「本乎天者親上，本乎地者親下，則各從其類也。」 「 類 」可指法則、法式。《荀子‧非十二子》：「案往舊造說，謂之五行，甚僻違而無類。」王先謙集解引王念孫曰：「類者，法也。言邪僻而無法也。」 「 類 」也指事理。《孟子‧告子上》：「指不若人，則知惡之；心不若人，則不知惡，此之謂不知類也。」趙岐注：「類，事也。」 「 類 」亦指比較。《禮記‧學記》：「九年，知類通達，強立而不反，謂之大成。」 鄭玄注：「知類，知事義之比也。」 「 類 」還指相似、像。《易‧繫辭下》：「於是始作八卦，以通神明之德，以類萬物之情。」孔穎達疏：「今作八卦，以類象萬物之情，皆可見也。」 「 類 」也表示類次。唐韓愈〈唐故相權公墓碑〉：「凡撰命詞九年，以類集為五十卷，天下稱其能。」 「 類 」亦表示善、美好。《書‧太甲中》：「予小子不明于德，自底不類。」孔傳：「類，善也。」 遵循也可用「 類 」表示。《國語‧楚語上》：「心類德音，以德有國。」 「 類 」還表示眾多。《淮南子‧要略》：「乃始攬物引類，覽取撟掇，浸想宵類。」高誘注：「類，眾也。」 「 類 」還能表示皆、大抵。《史記‧伯夷列傳》：「巖穴之士，趣舍有時若此，類名堙滅而不稱，悲夫！」
From the sound of " dog" and " 頪", the original meaning is kind, that is, the synthesis of multiple same or similar things. "Shuowen": "The type is similar, but the dog is the most important. From the dog, the piansheng." "Yi‧ Gan": "The one who is in the sky will kiss the person, and the one who is the earth will kiss, then each will follow its kind." " Class" can refer to rules and procedures. "Xunzi‧Fei Twelve Sons": "The five elements are said to be old-fashioned." Wang Xianqian gathered and quoted Wang Niansun and said: "The kind is the law. The words are evil and impossible." " Class" also refers to affair. "Mencius·Gaozishang": "It means that if you don't be human, you know evil; if your heart is not human, you don't know evil. This means that you don't know kind." Zhao Qi's note: "kind, things are also." " Class" also refers to comparison. "The Book of Rites‧The Book of Learning": "Nine years, knowing the class is masterful, standing strong without reversing, it is said to be great." Zheng Xuan's note: "Knowing the class, the ratio of the knowledge and the justice." " Class" also refers to similarity and resemblance. "Yi‧Xi Cixia": "So I started to make gossip, with the virtue of understanding the gods, with the affection of all things." Kong Yingdashu: "Today for gossip, with the love of all things, you can see it." " Class" also means class. Tang Hanyu's "Tang Gu Xiangquan Tombstone": "Fan wrote the Ming Ci for nine years. The collection is composed of 50 volumes, and the world calls it its energy." " Class" also means kindness and beauty. "Shu‧Taijiazhong": "I don't know the virtues of the boy, and he is not kind from the bottom." Kong Chuan: "Like, good." Compliance can also be represented by " class". "Mandarin ‧ Chu Yushang": "Heart-like German accents, and the country is built by virtue." " Class" also means many. "Huainanzi: Essentials": "It is the beginning of the collection of objects and the introduction of classes, and the immersing of the elements, and soaking in the night class." Gao You's note: "Classes, the public." " Class" can also mean everything, roughly. "Historical Records: The Biographies of Bo Yi": "The caveman, Qushe is sometimes like this, the class name is extinct and not known, sad husband!"

類字的基本解释

類
lèi
见“类”。

類字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lèi］
［《廣韻》力遂切，去至，來。］
“类1”的繁体字。
(1)种类；许多相同或相似的事物的综合。
(2)指族类。
(3)法式；法则。
(4)事理。
(5)形貌；形象。
(6)相似；像。
(7)比较；品别。
(8)类次。
(9)善，美好。
(10)遵循。
(11)众多。
(12)率，皆；大抵。
(13)古代传说中的兽名，似狸。
(14)古代祭名。以特别事故祭告天神。
(15)占卜时，龟行于水中，头向左顾者称“類”。
(16)通“纇”。偏；不平。
(17)通“纇”。疵节。

類字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【頁字部】　類； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1408第13
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?力遂切，音戾。【爾雅·釋詁】善也。【詩·大雅】克明克類。【箋】類，善也。勤施無私曰類。【又】孝子不匱，永錫爾類。【傳】類，善也。　又【玉篇】種類也。【易·乾卦】則各從其類也。又【繫辭】方以類聚。　又比也。【禮·學記】知類通達。【註】知事義之比也。又【緇衣】子曰：下之事上也，身不正，言不信，則義不壹，行無類也。【註】類謂比式。【疏】言行之無恆，不可比類也。又【左傳·襄九年】晉君類能而使之。【註】隨所能。　又肖似也。【禮·曲禮】諸侯旣塟見天子曰類見。【註】代父受國。類，猶象也。執皮帛，象諸侯之禮見也。　又祭名。【書·舜典】肆類于上帝。【詩·大雅】是類是禡。【周禮·春官·肆師】類造上帝。【鄭註】類禮依郊祀而爲之者。　又【爾雅·釋魚】龜左倪不類。【疏】倪，庳也，不發聲也。謂行時頭左邊庳下者名類。　又【山海經】亶爰之山有獸焉，其狀如貍而有髦，其名曰類。自爲牝牡，食者不妒。　又【爾雅翼】載兩類曰?類、奇類，卽兩體自爲牝牡者

類字的源字形

小篆楷体

暂无。

class
Basic explanation of words
class
lèi
See "Class".
class
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lèi］
["Guangyun" cut forcefully, go to, come. ]
"Class 1" in traditional characters.
(1) Type; a synthesis of many identical or similar things.
(2) Refers to ethnicity.
(3) French style; law.
(4) Affair.
(5) Appearance; image.
(6) Similar; like.
(7) Comparison; category.
(8) Class number.
(9) Good and beautiful.
(10) Follow.
(11) Numerous.
(12) Rate, both; roughly.
(13) The name of the beast in ancient legends, like a raccoon dog.
(14) Ancient sacrificial names. Sacrifice to Tenjin with a special accident.
(15) During divination, the turtle walks in the water, and those who look to the left are called "Like".
(16) Through "颣". Partial; uneven.
(17) Through "颣". Faulty section.
class
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words

Name meaning

lèi
вм. 类
Radicals: 米, 大, 頁  (rice, big, geoduck)
Meaning Mnemonic
A big geoduck loves to eat rice of every type, kind, and category. It doesn’t matter what kind of rice it is, this big geoduck will eat it.
Picture this big geoduck shoveling rice down in a flurry of geoduckness. Hear the sloshing and goopy glugging as the geoduck gorges itself on every type of rice.
Reading Mnemonic
While eating every type and kind of rice from every category, the big geoduck has become even bigger. Its body is ruined (るい). It’s painfully obese. This geoduck has eaten itself into ruin.
Picture this big, fat geoduck, too big to move. It’s now in a wheel chair and on a rice IV. Imagine its wheelchair squeaking by as it wheezes and groans.
